content.body: I was thinking of changing my attendance to the upcoming plenary from remote to in-person. Is it too late to make such a change? Is there still any space at the recommended hotels? And would there be office space on Friday ?
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: I was thinking of changing my attendance to the upcoming plenary from remote to in-person. Is it too late to make such a change? Is there still any space at the recommended hotels? And would there be office space on Friday ?

content.body:
There is still space in Hotel Avenida, which is one of the recommended hotels.

For the other questions, ryzokuken

content.formatted_body:
In reply to @mhofman:matrix.org
I was thinking of changing my attendance to the upcoming plenary from remote to in-person. Is it too late to make such a change? Is there still any space at the recommended hotels? And would there be office space on Friday ?
I believe we have space. I'll confirm from my colleagues and ping you.

content.body: Yes, please come in person! There are always no-shows so it would be great to see you Mathieu Hofman
